source: The 16th-century Dutch East India Company established a staging post where the port city of Cape Town is today situated in South Africa. The Van Riebeeck Company imported a large number of slaves from India, Indonesia, East Africa, Mauritius, and Madagascar. The free burghers were ex-VOC soldiers and gardeners, who were unable to return to Holland when their contracts with the VOC were completed. The VOC also brought some 71,000 slaves to Cape Town from India, Indonesia, East Africa, primarily from the Dutch colonies in Indonesia.

source: the princeton vase is a famous example of late classic maya ceramics in codex style , first published in m . d . thompson ' s ' the great maya and his contemporaries ' ( 1931 ) , and now a major piece of the pre - columbian collection of the national museum of mexico . originally painted as a drinking vessel for wine , it depicts a throne being approached by an owl , with an owl flying above him and by three young women surrounding him . in front of the throne a female dancer is being watched and threatened by two young men , a scene that has long been assumed to refer to an incident in the ahau san maya . as to the vase ' s art - historical importance , it invites comparison to the equally famous jaguar baby vase in the san francisco museum collection .
target: 普林斯顿瓶是晚期经典玛雅陶瓷中著名的编年体风格代表作，最早发表于M.D.汤普森的《伟大的玛雅及其同时代人》(1931年)，现为墨西哥国家博物馆前哥伦布时期收藏的重要展品。该瓶最初作为饮酒器具绘制，描绘了一位君主被一只猫头鹰接近的场景，君主头顶上方有一只飞翔的猫头鹰，身旁围绕着三位年轻女子。在王座前，一位女性舞者正被两位年轻男子注视并威胁，这一场景长期被认为指的是阿哈乌·桑玛雅的一个事件。关于该瓶的艺术史重要性，它常被拿来与旧金山博物馆收藏的同样著名的美洲豹幼崽瓶相提并论。

source: shannon is an unincorporated community in mason county , kentucky , united states . the village is southwest of mason city on u . s . route 40 , in the township of pine hill . the highest point in the community is dominated by a prominent limestone cliff and a mound built by the first settlers of the area . the original limestone lined earthwork is 2 ¹⁄₂ stories - high and 10 feet in diameter . historical holes in the mound have allowed further study and more precise dating of the mound ' s location . shannon is part of the mason city metropolitan statistical area statistical area .
target: 香农是美国肯塔基州梅森县的一个未建制社区。该村位于梅森市西南的40号美国国道上，位于松山乡。社区的最高点由一座著名的石灰岩悬崖和该地区的第一批定居者建造的土墩所主导。原始的石灰岩衬砌的土木工程高2¹⁄₂层，直径10英尺。土墩中的历史孔洞允许进一步研究和对土墩位置进行更精确的年代测定。香农是梅森市大都会统计区统计区的一部分。

source: the sisu sa - 150 medium size off - road lorry turned out to be too weak to pull the heaviest , domestic made cannons of the finnish defence forces . a larger , more robust lorry was developed as a replacement . the design work started in 1957 . the first two vehicles , called the sa 240 , were powered by turbocharged valmet 611 engines with a power output of 200 kw . the transmission , made by ab volvo , was equipped with a torque control system which allowed flexible operation on road and track . the transmission was tested by riding a single vehicle from the central helsinki district to the outer districts with the same system . after these tests were completed the engines were replaced by two turbocharged cummins twin engines and the vehicle code was changed to sa - 240 . the vehicle was also named rasi , which came from raskas masi , " mountain masi " .
target: 西苏SA-150中型越野卡车经证明无法拖曳芬兰国防军最重的国产火炮。因此，开发了一种更大、更坚固的卡车作为替代品。设计工作始于1957年。最初的两辆车，被称为SA-240，由配备了200千瓦输出功率的瓦尔梅特611涡轮增压发动机提供动力。变速箱由AB沃尔沃制造，并配备扭矩控制系统，可在公路和越野地形灵活运行。通过驾驶一辆车辆从赫尔辛基市中心行驶到郊区，对变速箱进行了测试，使用了相同的系统。在完成这些测试后，发动机被更换为两台配备涡轮增压的康明斯发动机，车辆型号也更改为SA-240。该车辆也被命名为Rasi，来源于“raskas masi”，意为“山地马西”。

source: noted for his wing play and ability to fire in accurate crosses , brennan was signed by peterborough united in his teenage years . in 2004 , he was capped several times for the all ireland schools under - 16 team , before moving back to play in the league of ireland . he was signed by steve holland for dublin city , however , after two months of action , newly appointed boss roddy collins ' ' takeover ' of the club meant that he was deemed surplus to requirements . eventually signed up by stephen kenny for limerick united for a summer loan , the striker was a revelation and made the left wing spot at the club into his own after having made his debut in a league match against st patrick ' ' s athletic on the same day . he has also been deployed to stand in at left full - back on occasions . in the 2006 season he played in their uefa cup runs in wins over ifk goteborg and fc barcelona - fc and helped derry to the ulster cup and league of ireland title . it is this particular talent that caught the attention of his hometown club , and subsequently limerick city , who confirmed their interest in brennan at the limerick city supporters ' club . however , it was limerick united who secured his services , taking the player on a free transfer .

source: The January 2010 Rio de Janeiro floods and mudslides was an extreme weather event that affected the State of Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in the first days of January 2010 . at least 85 people died , with at least 29 people in the hotel sankey after it was destroyed by landslides , and many more have been injured . More than 4,000 people were forced to evacuate their homes . The worst affected municipality was Angra dos Reis , about southwest of the city of Rio de Janeiro . At least 35 people were killed at a resort on Ilha Grande : about forty people were staying in the hotel which was buried under a mudslide , and the death toll is expected to rise further . Brazil 's only functioning nuclear power plant , Central Nuclear Almirante Álvaro Alberto , is also located within the municipality : plans were made for a temporary shutdown , as blocked roads would make any evacuation difficult or impossible in the event of an incident at the plant . In Rio Grande do Sul , at least seven people died and 20 went missing after a bridge collapsed due to heavy rains .

source: The Contribution of a Speech Perception Intervention to the Prevention of Phonological Awareness Deficits in Children With Speech Sound Disorders | Recent research reveals genetic and symptomatic overlap among children with speech sound disorders (i.e., those who (misarticulate more sounds than would be expected for their age) and children with dyslexia (i.e., those who struggle to learn to read). Children who have speech sound disorders as preschoolers are at risk for the later emergence of dyslexia, a risk that often reveals itself in the form of poor phonological awareness skills during the preschool period. Traditional speech therapy methods focus on articulation accuracy and do not focus on the child's more abstract knowledge of the sound system of the language. The ultimate objective of this research program is to prevent reading disability in children who present with speech sounds disorders. The relative effectiveness of different interventions to help these children achieve age-appropriate phonological processing skills prior to school entry will be investigated. It is expected that a combination of treatment approaches that focus on speech perception skills and vocabulary knowledge will have a superior impact on phonological awareness in comparison with a treatment approach that focuses solely on articulation accuracy.
target: 语音感知干预对预防语音障碍儿童语音意识缺陷的贡献 | 近期研究表明，语音障碍儿童（即那些语音错误多于同龄人预期的儿童）和阅读障碍儿童（即那些难以学会阅读的儿童）之间存在基因和症状上的重叠。作为学龄前儿童的语音障碍儿童有发展成阅读障碍的风险，这种风险通常在学龄前阶段表现为较差的语音意识技能。传统的语言治疗方法侧重于发音的准确性，而没有关注儿童对语言语音系统更抽象的知识。这项研究计划的最终目标是预防在伴有语音障碍的儿童中出现阅读障碍。将调查不同干预措施的相对有效性，以帮助这些儿童在入学前获得适合年龄的语音处理技能。预计将语音感知技能和词汇知识相结合的治疗方法，与仅侧重于发音准确性的治疗方法相比，对语音意识具有更优越的影响。

source: Intravenous sodium valproate versus diazepam infusion for the control of refractory status epilepticus in children : a randomized controlled trial . An open-label , randomized controlled study was conducted at a tertiary care teaching hospital to compare efficacy and safety of intravenous sodium valproate versus diazepam infusion for control of refractory status epilepticus . Forty children with refractory status epilepticus were randomized to receive either intravenous sodium valproate or diazepam infusion . Refractory status epilepticus was controlled in 80 % of the valproate and 85 % of the diazepam patients . The median time to control refractory status epilepticus was less in the valproate group ( 5 minutes ) than the diazepam group ( 17 minutes ; P < .001 ) . None of the patients in the valproate group required ventilation or developed hypotension , whereas in the diazepam group 60 % required ventilation and 50 % developed hypotension after starting diazepam infusion . No adverse effects on liver functions were seen with valproate . It is concluded that intravenous sodium valproate is an effective alternative to diazepam infusion in controlling refractory status epilepticus in children and is free of respiratory depression and hypotension .
target: 静脉注射丙戊酸钠与地西泮输注治疗儿童难治性癫痫持续状态的比较：一项随机对照试验。在一家三级护理教学医院开展了一项开放标签、随机对照研究，以比较静脉注射丙戊酸钠与地西泮输注控制难治性癫痫持续状态的疗效和安全性。40名患有难治性癫痫持续状态的儿童被随机分配接受静脉注射丙戊酸钠或地西泮输注。丙戊酸钠组中有80%的患者和地西泮组中有85%的患者控制了癫痫持续状态。丙戊酸钠组控制癫痫持续状态的中位时间（5分钟）明显短于地西泮组（17分钟；P < 0.001）。丙戊酸钠组的患者均未需要机械通气或出现低血压，而地西泮组中有60%的患者需要机械通气，50%在开始地西泮输注后出现低血压。丙戊酸钠组未出现肝功能方面的不良反应。结论是，静脉注射丙戊酸钠是控制儿童难治性癫痫持续状态的有效替代方法，且不会引起呼吸抑制或低血压。

source: The Israeli Labor Party ( , translit .
target:
以色列工党（希伯来语：מִפְלָגַת הָעֲבוֹדָה‎, translit. Mifleget haAvoda） is a center-left political party in Israel. It was founded in 1968 as a merger of several socialist and labor Zionist parties. Historically, it was the dominant party in Israeli politics, controlling the government for much of the country's early history. However, in recent decades, it has declined in popularity and influence, largely due to the rise of right-wing parties and the changing demographics of Israeli society. The party advocates for a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, social justice, and economic equality. It is currently led by Merav Michaeli. Despite its decline, it remains a significant force in Israeli politics and is often part of coalition governments. The party's base of support traditionally comes from secular Jews, labor unions, and kibbutzim.



希伯来语：מִפְלָגַת הָעֲבוֹדָה‎, translit. Mifleget haAvoda）是以色列的一个中左翼政党。它成立于 1968 年，是几个社会主义和劳动先锋 Zionist 政党的合并体。历史上，它是以色列政治中占主导地位的政党，在以色列建国初期控制着政府很长一段时间。然而，在近几十年里，由于右翼政党的崛起和以色列社会人口结构的变化，它的受欢迎程度和影响力有所下降。该党倡导通过两国方案解决以巴冲突，追求社会公正和经济平等。目前由梅拉夫·米哈埃利领导。尽管有所衰落，它仍然是以色列政治中的一支重要力量，并且经常是联合政府的一部分。该党的支持基础传统上来自世俗犹太人、工会和集体农庄。

source: The Letter from Birmingham Jail , also known as the Letter from Birmingham City Jail and The Negro Is Your Brother , is an open letter written on April 16 , 1963 , by Martin Luther King Jr . The letter defends the strategy of nonviolent resistance to racism . It says that people have a moral responsibility to break unjust laws and to take direct action rather than waiting potentially forever for justice to come through the courts . Responding to being referred to as an `` outsider , '' King writes , `` Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere '' . The letter , written during the 1963 Birmingham campaign , was widely published , and became an important text for the American Civil Rights Movement .
target: 《伯明翰监狱来信》，也被称为《伯明翰市监狱来信》和《黑人是你的兄弟》，是马丁·路德·金于1963年4月16日写的一封公开信。信中捍卫了非暴力抵抗种族主义的策略。信中指出，人们有道德责任打破不公正的法律，并采取直接行动，而不是可能永远等待法院实现正义。对于被称为“局外人”的回应，金写道：“任何地方的不公正都是对所有地方正义的威胁。”这封信写于1963年伯明翰运动期间，广为传播，成为美国民权运动的重要文本。

source: Mohenjo - daro was built in the 26th century BCE . It was one of the largest cities of the ancient Indus Valley Civilization , also known as the Harappan Civilization , which developed around 3,000 BCE from the prehistoric Indus culture . At its height , the Indus Civilization spanned much of what is now Pakistan and North India , extending westwards to the Iranian border , south to Gujarat in India and northwards to an outpost in Bactria , with major urban centers at Harappa , Mohenjo - daro , Lothal , Kalibangan , Dholavira and Rakhigarhi . Mohenjo - daro was the most advanced city of its time , with remarkably sophisticated civil engineering and urban planning . When the Indus civilization went into sudden decline around 1900 BCE , Mohenjo - daro was abandoned . The ruins of the city remained undocumented for around 3,700 years until R.D. Banerji , an officer of the Archaeological Survey of India , visited the site in 1919 -- 20 , identifying the Buddhist stupa ( 150 -- 500 CE ) known to be there and finding a flint scraper which convinced him of the site 's antiquity . This led to large - scale excavations of Mohenjo - daro led by Kashinath Narayan Dikshit in 1924 -- 25 , and John Marshall in 1925 -- 26 . In the 1930s , major excavations were conducted at the site under the leadership of Marshall , D.K. Dikshitar and Ernest Mackay . Further excavations were carried out in 1945 by Ahmad Hasan Dani and Mortimer Wheeler . The last major series of excavations were conducted in 1964 and 1965 by Dr. George F. Dales .
target: 莫亨佐-达罗是在公元前26世纪建造的。它是古代印度河谷文明（也称哈拉帕文明）最大的城市之一，印度河谷文明大约在公元前3000年从史前印度河文化发展而来。在其鼎盛时期，印度河文明覆盖了现在巴基斯坦和北印度的大部分地区，向西延伸到伊朗边境，向南延伸到印度的古吉拉特邦，向北延伸到巴克特里亚的前哨站，主要城市中心分别是哈拉帕、莫亨佐-达罗、洛塔尔、卡利班甘、德霍拉维拉和拉基加尔希。莫亨佐-达罗是当时最先进的城市，具有非常先进的土木工程和城市规划。印度河文明在公元前1900年左右突然衰落，莫亨佐-达罗被废弃。城市的遗址在3700多年里没有被记录，直到1919-20年，印度考古调查局的官员R.D. Banerji访问了该遗址，确认了当地的佛塔（公元150-500年）并发现了一件石刮刀，这使他相信该遗址的古老性。这导致了1924-25年由Kashinath Narayan Dikshit领导和1925-26年由John Marshall领导的大规模挖掘。20世纪30年代，在Marshall、D.K. Dikshitar和Ernest Mackay的领导下，对该遗址进行了大规模的挖掘。1945年，Ahmad Hasan Dani和Mortimer Wheeler进行了进一步的挖掘。最后一次大规模挖掘是在1964年和1965年由乔治·F·戴尔斯博士进行的。

source: When he would tour , staying in hotels , `` the rooms would be remodeled in advance of his arrival , so as to make the same configurations of space as he had at home -- the Graceland mansion . His furniture would arrive , and he could unwind after his performances in surroundings which were completely familiar and comforting , '' the room in question , ' The Jungle Room ' being `` an example of particularly lurid kitsch . '' On August 16 , 1977 , Presley died in the bathroom at Graceland allegedly of a heart attack . Elvis Presley lay in state in a 900 - pound copper - lined coffin just inside the foyer while over 3,500 of Elvis ' mourning fans passed by to pay their respects . A private funeral with 200 mourners was held on August 18 , 1977 in the house , with the casket placed in front of the stained glass doorway of the music room . Graceland continued to be occupied by members of the family until the death of Elvis ' aunt Delta in 1993 , who had moved in at Elvis ' invitation after her husband 's death . Elvis ' daughter , Lisa Marie Presley , inherited the estate in 1993 when she turned 25 . Presley , his parents Gladys & Vernon Presley , and his grandmother Minnie Mae Presley are buried on the property in the Meditation Garden . A memorial gravestone for Presley 's stillborn twin brother , Jesse Garon , is also at the site . Graceland was listed in the National Register of Historic Places on November 7 , 1991 and designated a National Historic Landmark on March 27 , 2006 Graceland was the first site related to rock and roll to be entered in the National Register of Historic Places .
target: 当他巡演并在酒店住宿时，“他的房间会在他到达之前提前翻新，以使其空间配置与他在家的格雷斯兰豪宅相同。他的家具会运到，他可以在完全熟悉和舒适的环境中在演出后放松，” 提到的房间，“丛林屋”就是一个“特别艳俗的俗气例子”。1977年8月16日，普雷斯利在格雷斯兰的浴室里被认为因心脏病发作而去世。埃尔维斯·普雷斯利躺在一个900磅重的铜制棺材里，就在门厅内，超过3500名哀悼的粉丝前来瞻仰遗容。一场有200名哀悼者参加的私人葬礼于1977年8月18日在房子里举行，棺材被放置在音乐室的彩色玻璃门前。格雷斯兰一直被家人居住，直到1993年埃尔维斯的阿姨戴尔塔去世，她是在她丈夫去世后应埃尔维斯的邀请搬进去的。埃尔维斯的女儿丽莎·玛丽·普雷斯利在1993年她25岁时继承了遗产。普雷斯利、他的父母格拉迪斯和弗农·普雷斯利，以及他的祖母米妮·梅·普雷斯利被埋葬在房产内的冥想花园。普雷斯利死产的双胞胎弟弟杰西·加伦的纪念墓碑也在该地点。格雷斯兰于1991年11月7日被列入国家历史名录，并于2006年3月27日被指定为国家历史地标。格雷斯兰是第一个与摇滚乐相关的被列入国家历史名录的地点。

source: Alternating current ( AC ) is an electric current which periodically reverses direction , in contrast to direct current ( DC ) which flows only in one direction . Alternating current is the form in which electric power is delivered to businesses and residences , and it is the form of electrical energy that consumers typically use when they plug kitchen appliances , televisions and electric lamps into a wall socket . A common source of DC power is a battery cell in a flashlight . The abbreviations AC and DC are often used to mean simply alternating and direct , as when they modify current or voltage . The usual waveform of alternating current in most electric power circuits is a sine wave . In certain applications , different waveforms are used , such as triangular or square waves . Audio and radio signals carried on electrical wires are also examples of alternating current . These types of alternating current carry information encoded ( or modulated ) onto the AC signal , such as sound ( audio ) or images ( video ) . These currents typically alternate at higher frequencies than those used in power transmission .
target: 交流电（AC）是一种周期性改变方向的电流，与只朝一个方向流动的直流电（DC）形成对比。交流电是电力输送到企业及住宅的形式，也是消费者将厨房用具、电视机和电灯插入墙上的插座时通常使用的电能形式。一个常见的直流电源是手电筒中的电池。缩写 AC 和 DC 常常用来简单表示交流和直流，例如当它们修饰电流或电压时。在大多数电力电路中，交流电的常用波形为正弦波。在某些应用中，会使用不同的波形，例如三角波或方波。通过电线传输的音频和无线电信号也是交流电的例子。这些类型的交流电将信息编码（或调制）到交流信号中，例如声音（音频）或图像（视频）。这些电流的频率通常高于用于电力传输的频率。

source: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

source: Jens Oliver Lisberg ( 24 December 1896 – 31 August 1920 ) ( Jens Olivur Lisberg in modern Faroese ) is one of the designers of the Merkið , the flag of the Faroe Islands . While a law student in Copenhagen , he devised the flag in 1919 with two other Faroese students , Janus Øssursson from Tórshavn and Paul Dahl from Vágur . Lisberg raised the flag for the first time on Faroese soil on 22 June 1919 on returning to his home town of Fámjin . It would not however receive official status until 25 April 1940 when the British occupation government approved its use as the civil ensign of the islands . Lisberg died of pneumonia on 31 August 1920 . He is buried in Fámjin , where the church now holds the original copy of the Merkið .
target: 延斯·奥利弗·利斯贝格（Jens Oliver Lisberg，1896年12月24日－1920年8月31日）（现代法罗语称Jens Olivur Lisberg）是法罗群岛旗帜“Merkið”的设计者之一。1919年，他在哥本哈根作为一名法律系学生，与另外两名法罗群岛学生——来自托尔斯港的贾纳斯·厄苏尔森（Janus Øssursson）和来自瓦乌尔的保罗·达尔（Paul Dahl）——共同设计了这面旗帜。1919年6月22日，利斯贝格首次在法罗群岛本土的法姆因镇升起了这面旗帜。然而，直到1940年4月25日，英国占领政府批准其作为法罗群岛民用旗帜使用时，该旗帜才获得官方认可。利斯贝格于1920年8月31日因肺炎去世，葬于法姆因教堂内，教堂现收藏有“Merkið”的原始版本。
